edu.cwru.SimpleRTS.util
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  edu.cwru.SimpleRTS.util.Configuration

public final class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

Manages a list of preferences and allows for saving to/loading from a file.

Author:
Tim
